entry.title: Friday night: Freezing rain or rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets changing to rain or freezing rain this evening then to freezing rain or ice pellets late this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along the coast. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023
